Botanic Gardens.name: Botanic Gardens
Botanic Gardens.about: Cornell Botanic Gardens is a 4,300-acre botanical garden, showcasing a diverse collection of plants from around the world. It serves as an educational and research center for plant conservation and sustainable gardening practices.

Buttermilk Falls State Park.name: Buttermilk Falls State Park
Buttermilk Falls State Park.about: The park features a stunning natural pool at the base of a cascading waterfall, which visitors can swim in during the summer months. The park also offers hiking trails through the gorge, picnic areas, and a campground for overnight stays.

Herbert F. Johnson Museum of Art.name: Herbert F. Johnson Museum of Art
Herbert F. Johnson Museum of Art.about: The museum showcases a diverse collection of over 35,000 works of art from around the world, including ancient and modern art, photography, and prints. The museum's architecture, designed by I.M. Pei, is a work of art in itself.
